Description:
Everything Your Family Could Ask For.....And More
Set Negotiation: Monday 23rd April at 6:00pm (Unless Sold Prior)
Impressive with its scale, inviting with its style this designer home, constructed by a boutique builder to our vendors exacting specifications combines contemporary living and accommodation spaces and with a relaxing entertainers garden to deliver everything your family could ask for and more!
Forming the hub of the home is a generous family living meals which wraps around a striking new kitchen showcasing glossy cabinetry, quality appliances (dual ovens) and stone benchtops you just want to lean on and chat, while the chef works their magic.
Complementing this family friendly space is a casual living zone anchored by a woodfire heater and a separate, expansive living dining area. Filled with natural light and under a double height ceiling, it is anchored by an open fire place. The ground floor study delivers space for home work or to work from home, a full bathroom is a welcome surprise, as is the large utility room with laundry facilities.
The upper level is all about substantial accommodation options and includes a main bedroom with fitted walk in robe and a spa ensuite. Through clever design two of the remaining three bedrooms both open directly to a sumptuous family bathroom to enjoy ensuite convenience of their own.
The large rear yard delivers a peaceful, private landscaped haven for entertaining or just relaxing.
On a 766sqm corner allotment (approx.) which introduces two gated entry points for boats/caravans/trailers, the long list of enticements includes oversized double garage with storeroom/gymspace, ducted heating, cooling and vacuum, quality drapery and a blend of timber, tiles and superiorgrade carpet.
Metres from the park and easily accessing Epping Plaza, station and the shops cafes and eateries along High Street, it delivers excellent living in a premium pocket.
